title: Thursday Post Show (8-5-21)
itunes:title: Thursday Post Show (8-5-21)
description:
Bobby starts by talking about a man who said that God told him to burn his house down. We question the validity of his claim. Bobby shares some pieces of country music history that all happened on this day. Bobby on what it’s like having artists over to his house to record his podcast. We also called Caroline Hobby of the Get Real podcast. Bobby gives us an update on speaking at a podcast panel yesterday. Bobby gives his Top 5 “She’s” in his life. Bobby also shares his favorite story about the band Green Day.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
